title: Hyundai Is Still Determined To Push The Fuel Cell Mobility Envelope…In The US, No Less
description:
Hyundai is targeting the hydrogen fuel cell market in the US, Korea, and Europe, with a focus on electrifying public transportation, fleets, and port logistics.

The post Hyundai Is Still Determined To Push The Fuel Cell Mobility Envelope…In The US, No Less appeared first on CleanTechnica.
